meanings.sent1: I bought a refillable water bottle to use less plastic.
meanings.sent2: The refillable ink cartridge saved me money in the long run.
meanings.sent3: My refillable mug is like a magic cup that never runs out of coffee.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a refillable well of creativity, always ready for new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The refillable gas tank on the car made road trips much easier.

meanings.definition: Able to be replenished with a fresh supply.
meanings.sent1: The refillable candy jar was always a hit at the office.
meanings.sent2: I prefer using refillable batteries to reduce waste.
meanings.sent3: His jokes were like a refillable well of laughter, always bringing joy.
meanings.sent4: The refillable energy in the room was palpable, fueling everyone's enthusiasm.
meanings.sent5: The refillable stock of snacks kept the party going all night.
